title: Snow safe
creator_contributor_role: Australian Ski Patrol Association, production company
subject_group: Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Skis and skiing - Safety measures
description: A well produced video looking at all aspects of ski and snow safety. Covers appropriate clothing and equipment, selection of equipment, getting proper ski instruction, ski slope courtesy and behaviour, using lifts, ski slope signs, what to do in case of accident or getting lost, care of children, food and hypothermia, and safe tobogganing. Narrated by Debbie Byrne.
